productData.name: Spaghetti and Meatballs
productData.description: A classic Italian-American dish featuring tender spaghetti noodles smothered in a rich, meaty tomato sauce and topped with juicy meatballs. Our meatballs are handcrafted with a blend of ground beef and pork, seasoned to perfection. This comforting meal is perfect for any occasion.

mealKitData.contents: Ground beef, ground pork, breadcrumbs, egg, Parmesan cheese, garlic, onion, Italian seasoning, salt, pepper, crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, olive oil, onion, garlic, basil, oregano, salt, pepper, spaghetti pasta
mealKitData.allergens: Wheat (pasta), milk (Parmesan cheese), soy (soy lecithin in some pasta), egg.

productData.name: Baked Ziti
productData.description: A hearty and comforting Italian-American dish. Layers of ziti pasta are baked with a rich, meaty tomato sauce, creamy ricotta cheese, and melted mozzarella cheese. This classic recipe is perfect for family dinners and gatherings.

mealKitData.contents: pasta, ricotta cheese, mozzarella cheese, tomato sauce, meat (ground beef or sausage), Parmesan cheese, eggs, Italian seasoning, salt, pepper
mealKitData.allergens: Wheat (pasta), Milk (ricotta cheese, mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese), Egg

productData.name: Butter Chicken
productData.description: A rich and creamy Indian dish featuring tender, juicy chicken marinated in a blend of aromatic spices and yogurt, then cooked in a velvety tomato-based sauce. This flavorful dish is often served with naan or rice.

mealKitData.contents: Chicken, yogurt, tomato puree, cream, butter, garam masala, cumin, coriander, turmeric, ginger, garlic, chili powder, cardamom, cloves, cinnamon, salt, pepper

productData.name: Chicken Salad Sandwiches
productData.description: A classic, light and refreshing sandwich featuring creamy chicken salad made with tender chicken, celery, onion, mayonnaise, and a touch of lemon juice, served on your choice of bread.

mealKitData.contents: Chicken, celery, onion, mayonnaise, lemon juice, salt, pepper, bread.

productData.name: Birria Tacos
productData.description: A flavorful and authentic Mexican dish featuring slow-cooked, tender beef or goat meat marinated in a rich, spicy chili sauce. The meat is then served on warm corn tortillas with chopped onions, cilantro, and a side of consom√© for dipping.

mealKitData.contents: Beef or goat, chili peppers, onion, garlic, cumin, oregano, bay leaves, cinnamon, cloves, allspice, salt, pepper, corn tortillas, onion, cilantro, lime.
